short_summary: Evaluation Services Consultant to finalize the Indigenous Guardians Pilot Evaluation Strategy and Comprehensive Evaluation of the Indigenous Guardians Pilot. Estimated level of effort: 195 days.
description: Environment and Climate Change Canada requires the services of one (1) Evaluation Services Consultant to complete the final step (step 3) of the Indigenous Guardians Pilot Evaluation Strategy, the Comprehensive Evaluation of the Indigenous Guardians Pilot.",
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: Evaluation Services Consultant for Indigenous Guardians Pilot Evaluation Strategy
#### Solicitation Number: 5000067218
#### Publication Date: 2023-01-10
#### Tender Closing Date: 2023-01-25T13:00:00
#### Status: Expired

The Government of Environment and Climate Change Canada has issued a request for proposal (RFP) for an Evaluation Services Consultant to support the Indigenous Guardians Pilot Evaluation Strategy. The proposed contract is part of the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) method of supply.

**Scope of Work**

The consultant will be responsible for completing the final step (step 3) of the Indigenous Guardians Pilot Evaluation Strategy, specifically the Comprehensive Evaluation of the Indigenous Guardians Pilot. This requires expertise in evaluation services, project management, and consultation.

**Security Requirements**

The contract requires a Company Minimum Security Level of Protected B, Resource Minimum Security Level of Protected B, and Document Safeguarding Security Level of Protected B.

**Solicitation History**

The RFP is open only to those Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who are qualified under Tier 1 for category 2.12 Evaluation Consultant. The following SA Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Accenture Inc.
* Adirondack Information Management Inc.
* Alinea International Ltd.
* Avascent Canada ULC
* BDO Canada LLC
* Cathexis Consulting Inc.
* Deloitte Inc.
* Donna Cona Inc.
* Ernst & Young LLP
* Ference & Companay Consulting Ltd.
* Groupe Intersol Group Ltee.
* HDP Group Inc.
* Hickling, Arthurs, Low Corporation
* Kelly Sears Consulting Group
* Mobile Resource Group Inc.
* OLAV Consulting Corp.
* MOSHWA Aboriginal Information Technology Corporation
* Orbis Risk Consulting Inc.
* Posterity Group Consulting Inc
* PRA Inc.
* R.A. Malatest & Associates Ltd.
* Salasan Consulting Inc.
* The Universalia Management Group Ltd.

**Proposed Contract Period**

The proposed contract period is from contract award to March 31, 2024, with an estimated level of effort of 195 days.

**Communication**

For any queries or concerns, please contact Michel Larivière at michel.lariviere@ec.gc.ca.

**Document**

Download the full document [insert link here] if available. **Caution**
